item.title: The Monty Hall Problem
item.description: The book “The Drunkards Walk” 1 deals with how randomness influences our lives and the difficulties people have in understanding probability. In one of the passages, to illustrate this last point, the author brings up the following problem: Imagine that you are given a choice between 3 doors, behind one of the doors there is a prize and the others hide a goat. After you have made the choice, one of the doors where there is nothing is opened and you are given the choice to change the door or not.
